post.author: Evelen
post.body:
Anyone knowns how can i buid resources file?

I see cmd - " writeResourceFile"
But what does it mean "<manifest file>"
is it something like list of files ?

manifest file - it is message, that i can see after use writeResourceFile in console...
I don't understand how can i use this command...

post.author: reckless
post.body: I would suspect that the manifest is a list of contents but in what format im not at Liberty to say ? might be XML but could also be something as simple as a text file.

post.body:
Anyone knowns how can i buid resources file?

I see cmd - " writeResourceFile"
But what does it mean "<manifest file>"
is it something like list of files ?

manifest file - it is message, that i can see after use writeResourceFile in console...
I don't understand how can i use this command...

post.author: reckless
post.body: I would suspect that the manifest is a list of contents but in what format im not at Liberty to say ? might be XML but could also be something as simple as a text file.
